channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google moonshot spinout SandboxAQ claims an ex-exec is attempting ‘extortion’
item.description: A former SandboxAQ executive filed a wrongful termination lawsuit filled with shocking allegations. The company is fighting back, hard.

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on Netflix, WIRED's Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Stranger Things, Run Away, and His & Hers are just a few of the shows you need to watch on Netflix this month.

item.title: ICE Can Now Spy on Every Phone in Your Neighborhood
item.description: Plus: Iran shuts down its internet amid sweeping protests, an alleged scam boss gets extradited to China, and more.

item.title: Best Deals for New Year’s Resolutions: Sleep, Fitness, and More (2026)
item.description: Whether you’re hitting the gym or tracking your schedule, these discounts on WIRED-approved gear can help.

item.title: The 50 Best Movies on Netflix, WIRED’s Picks (January 2026)
item.description: Good Night, and Good Luck: Live From Broadway, Frankenstein, and Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery are just a few of the movies you should watch ...

item.title: Fujifilm X-E5 Mirrorless Camera Review: Compact Color Science in a Retro Package
item.description: Did you want the TikTok-popular X100VI, but with an interchangeable lens? The Fujifilm X-E5 has you covered.

item.title: Meta signs deals with three nuclear companies for 6-plus GW of power
item.description: Two smaller companies, Oklo and TerraPower, along with Vistra, a large energy company, just signed agreements with Meta.

item.title: How the Sleepbuds maker, Ozlo, is building a platform for sleep data
item.description: Ozlo Sleepbuds are going to have a big year, with new products, AI features, and more.
